name: Hospital Floor Tile
description: Perfectly seamless tileable hospital floor tile that repeats in all directions. Worn and aged linoleum with visible grout lines, subtle dirt and stains, and slight reflective surface. Light cream/off-white color with gray grout. Suitable for medical/hospital environments in top-down games.

generated.prompt: A perfectly seamless tileable hospital floor texture that repeats infinitely in all directions. Worn aged linoleum hospital floor with visible grout lines. Light cream off-white tiles with gray grout. Subtle dirt marks, scuff marks, and realistic wear. Slight reflective polished surface. CRITICAL: The left edge must connect perfectly with the right edge, and the top edge must connect perfectly with the bottom edge to create a seamless repeating pattern. No visible seams when tiled. Top-down orthographic view. Tileable game texture for 2D top-down game.
